T04D3875a:90b-1: bo dhi satva ts'arya aa ba t'a ra du ra ba bo dha na ni /
T04D3875a:90b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rtogs
T04D3875a:90b-5: par dka' ba'i gnas gtan la dbab pa zhes bya
T04D3875a:90b-6: ba'i gzhung / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3875a:90b-7: yun ring dad dang brtson pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan mchog la rab gzhol zhing //
T04D3875a:90b-8: gang gi spyi gtsug mchog gis 'jam dbyangs zhabs kyi padma la reg pa //
T04D3875a:90b-9: sa stengs 'jam dbyangs gnyis pa yin zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bstod pa bstan bcos rtsom pa po //
T04D3875a:90b-10: bstod phyir bdag gi yid kyis dad pa'i me tog snyim pa bkang bas 'thor //
T04D3875a:91a-0: dad pa med pa dgra yi rtsa ba shes rab zhan pa 'chi bdag @91a * //
T04D3875a:91a-2: de phyir dad med dgra yi dbang song blun pa'i zhags par chud pa rnams //
T04D3875a:91a-3: 'jam dbyangs gsung gi bdud rtsi snyan gyi snod kyis gsol nas gtor ba yi //
T04D3875a:91a-4: gzhung mchog smod byed de dag rnams la brtse phyir 'khrul pa'i gnas rnams bshad ;
T04D3875a:91a-5: /'di na bstan bcos rtsom pa ni gnyis te /
T04D3875a:91a-6: sde ba sbyor lhur len pas gzhung mdzes pa gcor
T04D3875a:91a-7: byed pa btsun pa zla grags la sogs pa dang
T04D3875a:91a-8: // phan 'dogs pa lhur len pas sems 'dul ba
T04D3875a:91a-9: gtso bor byed pa slob dpon lun dha ka la
T04D3875a:91a-10: // sogs pa'o // de la slob dpon zhi ba'i
T04D3875a:91a-11: lha 'di ni phan 'dogs pa lhur len pa yin
T04D3875a:91a-12: // sogs pa'o // gyis / sdeb sbyor dang snyan
T04D3875a:91a-13: ngag la sogs pa gtso bor byed pa ma yin
T04D3875a:91a-14: // sogs pa'o // gyis / te / de'i phyir
T04D3875a:91a-15: byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa 'dir sdeb
T04D3875a:91a-19: spel ba la sogs pa ma byung bas ni spang bar bya ba ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T04D3875a:91a-20: de ltar yin du zin kyang 'di la dgos pa
T04D3875a:91a-21: la sogs pa med do zhes bsam par mi bya
T04D3875a:91a-22: ste / ji ltar bkod pa'i gzhung ni byang chub
T04D3875a:91a-23: sems dpa'i spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T04D3875a:91a-24: gi bdag nyid ston pa la 'jug pas 'brel pa
T04D3875a:91a-25: dang bcas pa'i brjod par bya ba dang /
T04D3875a:91a-26: rjod pa'i ngo bo gnas la /
T04D3875a:91a-27: de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' de
T04D3875a:91a-28: dag gis rang gi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin
T04D3875a:91a-29: pa drug gi phyogs rtogs te /
T04D3875a:91a-30: rtogs pa dang rjes su mthun par bsgrubs pas sangs
T04D3875a:91a-31: rgyas kyis thob kyi bar gyi dgos pa grub nas
T04D3875a:91a-32: / srid pa ji srid du 'gro ba la phan
T04D3875a:91a-33: par gnas pa dgos pa'i yang dgos pa nyid la
T04D3875a:91a-34: / gnas so // de ltar yang gsungs pa gzhan
T04D3875a:91a-35: don phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i
T04D3875a:91a-37: sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan //
T04D3875a:91a-38: de yi don gyi 'bras bur bshad //
T04D3875a:91a-40: / de bas na 'di'i dgos pa la sogs pa ni gzhung gi ming nyid kyis bstan te /
T04D3875a:91a-41: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya bas ni /
T04D3875a:91a-42: 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i brjod bya bstan la /
T04D3875a:91a-43: ma 'khrul par bkrol ba la sogs pa yod pas
T04D3875a:91b-0: na dgos pa la sogs pa'i don @91b chen po
T04D3875a:91b-1: nyid med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3875a:91b-2: yang ni slob dpon dngos grub thob pa dang /
T04D3875a:91b-3: bden pa gzigs pa'i tshig la ni dgos pa la
T04D3875a:91b-4: sogs pa med par dogs pa mi rigs pas slob
T04D3875a:91b-5: dpon gyi zhal snga nas ni phyag 'tshal ba'i dngos
T04D3875a:91b-6: grub brnyes pa nyid pas de dgos pa la sogs
T04D3875a:91b-7: pa blon po rnams 'ba' zhig la bsnyad par zad
T04D3875a:91b-8: do // bden pa gzigs pa rnams kyi tshig la
T04D3875a:91b-9: yang dgos pa med par rtog na de'i gzung bar
T04D3875a:91b-11: ji ltar zla ba grags pas gsungs pa /
T04D3875a:91b-12: thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
T04D3875a:91b-13: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //
T04D3875a:91b-14: rjes su bzung bar ma nus pa //
T04D3875a:91b-15: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T04D3875a:91b-17: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma dad pa dang /
T04D3875a:91b-18: the tshom gyi dra ba dang bral ba dang /
T04D3875a:91b-19: slob dpon gyi bka' lung la gus pas shes par
T04D3875a:91b-20: 'dod pa dag gis 'di khong du chud par bya'o
T04D3875a:91b-21: // bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid dang /
T04D3875a:91b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsnyad pa dang /
T04D3875a:91b-23: bka' drin rjes su dran pa'i phyag 'tshal ba dang
T04D3875a:91b-24: zhes bya ba gsum po ni bstan bcos 'di'i lus
T04D3875a:91b-25: yin par skye bo chen po dag bzhed do //
T04D3875a:91b-27: phyag 'tshal ba dang gzhung brtsam par zhal gyis bzhes pa ni bar chad med pa dang /
T04D3875a:91b-28: bsam pa tshar chod pas bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin la /
T04D3875a:91b-29: rang gi don du brtsam par bsnyad pas ni mkhas
T04D3875a:91b-30: pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga' zhig khyod kyis
T04D3875a:91b-31: bdag cag rjes su gzung mi dgos so zhes bar
T04D3875a:91b-32: chad byed pa bzlog pas bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu
T04D3875a:91b-33: nyid do // skal pa mnyam pa rnams la bskul bas ni de dag dad par 'gyur zhing /
T04D3875a:91b-34: dad pa dang ldan pa'i snod du bstan bcos bzhag
T04D3875a:91b-35: par rigs so zhes dgongs pas bstan pa la 'jug
T04D3875a:91b-36: pas na bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid do //
T04D3875a:91b-37: des na bde gshegs chos kyi sku mnga' sras bcas dang //
T04D3875a:91b-38: btsun pa kun la gus pas phyag 'tshal te //
T04D3875a:91b-39: bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa rnams //
T04D3875a:91b-40: gsung rab tshig las btus pa bstan par bya //
T04D3875a:91b-41: zhes pa ni bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu dang po'o //
T04D3875a:91b-42: sngon chad ma byung ba yang 'dir brjod med ces pa nas //
T04D3875a:91b-43: rang gi yid la bsgom phyir ngas 'di brtsams //
T04D3875a:92a-0: @92a * // zhes bya ba'i bar ni de'i rgyu gnyis pa'o //
T04D3875a:92a-1: dge ba bsgom par bdag gi dad pa'i shugs //
T04D3875a:92a-3: ji ste 'di dag mthong na don yod 'gyur //
T04D3875a:92a-4: zhes pa'i bar ni de'i rgyu gsum pa'o //
T04D3875a:92a-5: de la bstan bcos 'byung ba'i rgyu dang po ni
T04D3875a:92a-6: gdul bya dag la bslab pa'i ched du zad de
T04D3875a:92a-7: / mchog gi dngos grub thob pa dag ni bgegs 'byung bar dgongs pa dang /
T04D3875a:92a-8: don dang ldan pa'i bya ba brtsams pa las ldog pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3875a:92a-10: lus gnyis pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bdag nyid bzhag pa ste /
T04D3875a:92a-11: de ni le'u dang po byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon bstan pa dang /
T04D3875a:92a-12: gnyis pa sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T04D3875a:92a-13: gsum pa byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung ba dang /
T04D3875a:92a-14: bcu pa smon lam gyi le'u ste /
T04D3875a:92a-15: de ltar rnam pa bzhi ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04D3875a:92a-17: le'u dang po gsum ni byang chub tu sems bskyed
T04D3875a:92a-18: pa'i ngo bo yin la gang byang chub tu sems
T04D3875a:92a-19: brtan pa de ni lus la sogs pa yongs su
T04D3875a:92a-21: lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang //
T04D3875a:92a-22: dus gsum dge ba thams cad kyang //
T04D3875a:92a-23: sems can kun gyi don grub phyir //
T04D3875a:92a-24: phangs pa med par gtang bar bya //
T04D3875a:92a-25: zhes le'u gsum pa las gsungs pa'i phyir byang chub
T04D3875a:92a-26: sems dpa' dag gi smon lam ni phrag dog gi
T04D3875a:92a-27: dri ma med pas gzhan la phan pa'i go skabs
T04D3875a:92a-29: de bas na smon lam gyi le'u yang sbyin par
T04D3875a:92a-30: brjod pa'o zhes blo dang ldan pa dag 'chad do
T04D3875a:92a-31: // bag yod par bstan pa dang /
T04D3875a:92a-32: shes bzhin bsrung ba bstan pa'i le'u gnyis ni tshul khrims brjod pa'o //
T04D3875a:92a-33: le'u lhag ma bzhi ni go rims bzhin du bzod pa dang /
T04D3875a:92a-36: shes rab ston pa la 'jug pa'o //
T04D3875a:92a-37: da ni lus gnyis pa'i dbang du byas te /
T04D3875a:92a-38: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas par bstan par bya ste /
T04D3875a:92a-39: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas pas /
T04D3875a:92a-40: dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed par shin tu dka' //
T04D3875a:92a-42: 'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung //
T04D3875a:92b-0: zhes pa'i bar gyis rnyed par dka' ba'i skyes pa chud mi gsan @92b par sems bskyed do //
T04D3875a:92b-1: de ltar sems bskyed pas ji ltar na bdag gis skye ba 'bras bu can du 'gyur /
T04D3875a:92b-2: 'di'i thabs ni gang zhig yin zhes rtog pa la //
T04D3875a:92b-3: de ltas dge ba nyam chung nyid la rtag / ces pa nas /
T04D3875a:92b-4: byams mgon blo dang ldan pas nor bzangs bshad //
T04D3875a:92b-5: ces bya ba'i bar gyis phan yon bsnyad pas sems dran par bya ba dang bcas te /
T04D3875a:92b-6: de'i thabs ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
T04D3875a:92b-7: de de ltar thabs khong du chud pas sems bskyed par 'dod pa sems bskyed pa gcig pu pa'am /
T04D3875a:92b-8: 'on te bye brag can zhes sems pa la zhugs pa la /
T04D3875a:92b-9: byang chub sems de mdor bsdu na //
T04D3875a:92b-11: bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min //
T04D3875a:92b-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis sems bskyed pa'i dbye ba gnyis
T04D3875a:92b-13: yon tan gyi bye brag mi 'dra bar bstan pa
T04D3875a:92b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon pa byang chub
T04D3875a:92b-16: kyi sems la smod cing 'dor ba dgag pa'i phyir
T04D3875a:92b-17: / gang nas bzung ste sems can khams //
T04D3875a:92b-19: bde ba'i 'byung gnas de la skyabs su mchi //
T04D3875a:92b-20: zhes bya ba le'u dang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T04D3875a:92b-21: bar du byang chub sems kyi yon tan brjod pa'o
T04D3875a:92b-22: // de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon pa'i sems
T04D3875a:92b-23: bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa len 'dod
T04D3875a:92b-24: // pa la / de'i 'dod chags bstan par bya ste /
T04D3875a:92b-25: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su
T04D3875a:92b-26: sbyangs pa la sems bskyed pa nyid rigs pa dang
T04D3875a:92b-27: por mchod pa la sogs pas sems sbyang ba'i phyir
T04D3875a:92b-28: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
T04D3875a:92b-29: bud mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la thal mo sbyar te /
T04D3875a:92b-30: sems rtse gcig tu byed pas /
T04D3875a:92b-31: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T04D3875a:92b-32: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T04D3875a:92b-33: bla ma rnams mngon du dmigs te /
T04D3875a:92b-34: dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug pas /
T04D3875a:92b-35: rin chen sems de gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T04D3875a:92b-37: slan chad bdag ni sdig pa yong mi bgyid //
T04D3875a:92b-38: ces pa'i bar du le'u gnyis pa zad par brjod do //
T04D3875a:92b-39: de ma thag tu yang sems can kun gyi ngan song gi / zhes pa nas /
T04D3875a:93a-0: bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyur yang shog / ces pa'i @93a * //
T04D3875a:93a-10: phreng ba'i me tog dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-14: sa gzhi bstar ba dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-15: gzhal yas khang dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-18: glu'i mchod pa smon lam gyis dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-19: dkon mchog gi gzugs brnyan la mchod pa smon lam gyis dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-20: bdag nyid chen po dag gi rjes su gzhol bas mchod pa dang /
T04D3875a:93a-23: bstod pa'i mchod pa smon lam gyis dbul ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-24: yul khyad par can la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-25: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang ;
T04D3875a:93a-26: skyabs su gsol ba bcas te 'gyod pa drag pos sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T04D3875a:93a-27: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T04D3875a:93a-30: smon lam shin tu rgyas par dmigs pa ste /
T04D3875a:93a-31: nyi shu rtsa bdun po dag gis sems rab tu sbyang ngo //
T04D3875a:93a-32: de nas sems bskyed par 'dod pa zhig na ni /
T04D3875a:93a-33: ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis /
T04D3875a:93a-34: byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa ltar //
T04D3875a:93a-35: zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum brjod do //
T04D3875a:93a-36: de nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
T04D3875a:93a-37: zhing sngar bshad pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'o
T04D3875a:93a-38: // gal te byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T04D3875a:93a-39: sdom pa gzung ba gnyi ga len 'dod pa zhig na ni /
T04D3875a:93a-40: ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis /
T04D3875a:93a-41: byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang //
T04D3875a:93a-42: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la //
T04D3875a:93a-43: de dag rim bzhin gnas pa ltar //
T04D3875a:93a-44: de bzhin 'gro ba'i phan don du //
T04D3875a:93a-45: byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T04D3875a:93a-46: de bzhin du ni bslab pa la'ang //
T04D3875a:93a-47: rim pa bzhin du bslab par bgyi //
T04D3875a:93a-48: zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T04D3875a:93a-49: de nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa'i grangs su son pa ste /
T04D3875a:93b-0: de'i phyir des ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i pham pa'i @93b gnas dang /
T04D3875a:93b-2: nyes byas kyi ltung ba rnams bsrung dgos pas /
T04D3875a:93b-3: slob dpon btsun pa zla bas sbyar ba'i byang chub
T04D3875a:93b-4: sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa la sogs pa
T04D3875a:93b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gtogs pa du
T04D3875a:93b-7: ltung ba rnams mi 'byung bar bya ba dang /
T04D3875a:93b-8: byung ba yang rings pa rings par gso bar bya'o //
T04D3875a:93b-9: yang na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thams cad kyi lus lta bu ni /
T04D3875a:93b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin pas 'di nyid la bslab par bya ste /
T04D3875a:93b-11: gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'di nyid las bshad pa /
T04D3875a:93b-12: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i cha bsrung
T04D3875a:93b-13: ba la gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
T04D3875a:93b-14: bslab pa gang yang gang 'dra la mi srid pa'i
T04D3875a:93b-15: phyir dang / ltung ba gso ba'i thabs kyang 'di nyid las 'byung ba'i bshags pa dang /
T04D3875a:93b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u las
T04D3875a:93b-17: bshad pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid la gnas pa
T04D3875a:93b-18: kho nas dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3875a:93b-19: gang dag las byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsrung ba de dag thams cad kyang /
T04D3875a:93b-20: 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'i le'u
T04D3875a:93b-21: las bshad pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin med pa la
T04D3875a:93b-22: goms pa kho nas bsrung ba de dang de thams
T04D3875a:93b-24: gang 'dir rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba /
T04D3875a:93b-25: sgyu ma nam mkha'i ngo bo yongs rtog pa //
T04D3875a:93b-26: don dam mthong ba'i bsrung ba de nyid yin //
T04D3875a:93b-27: bsrung ba'i chog gzhan dag 'dir ci dgos //
T04D3875a:93b-30: stong pa nyid ni rnam bsgoms na //
T04D3875a:93b-31: 'chi bdag gis ni mi mthong zhing //
T04D3875a:93b-32: gzhan yang bdud ni bye bas kyang //
T04D3875a:93b-33: mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T04D3875a:93b-35: de bzhin du slob dpon chos kyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T04D3875a:93b-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsrung ba
T04D3875a:93b-37: ni bsrung ba gzhan gyis bsrung mi dgos so zhes
T04D3875a:93b-38: bshad do // de ltar smon pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas /
T04D3875a:93b-39: bdag gzengs pa ston pas las kyi mtha' mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir /
T04D3875a:93b-40: de ltar blo dang ldan pa yis //
T04D3875a:93b-42: mar gyi nying khu byung ba yin //
T04D3875a:93b-43: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do //
T04D3875a:93b-44: de nas 'gro ba thams cad dbugs 'byung ba dang /
T04D3875a:94a-0: @94a * // tshogs chen po la dgod pa'i khur mi 'dor bar bya ba'i phyir /
T04D3875a:94a-1: 'gro ba'i 'dron [?] pa srid pa'i lam rgyu zhing //
T04D3875a:94a-3: lha dang lha min la sogs dga' bar gyis //
T04D3875a:94a-4: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis le'u gsum pa zad par brjod de /
T04D3875a:94a-5: de ltar na le'u dang po gsum ni smon pa'i
T04D3875a:94a-6: byang chub sems bskyed pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan
T04D3875a:94a-8: de la blo gros nyams pa kha cig ni skyon 'dogs te /
T04D3875a:94a-9: 'dir ni rim pa legs par brjod do /
T04D3875a:94a-10: 'dir sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa blang ba'i tshig ni tha mar byung la /
T04D3875a:94a-11: rin chen sems de gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T04D3875a:94a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa 'phel bar bya ba'i tshig sngon du brjod do zhes pa dang /
T04D3875a:94a-13: skabs ma yin pa'i tshig mchod pa brjod pa'i skabs
T04D3875a:94a-14: su sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa yong do
T04D3875a:94a-15: zhes so // de dag ni blun po kho na'i tshig ste /
T04D3875a:94a-16: gal te mchod pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa
T04D3875a:94a-17: 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir yin na ni de'i phyir
T04D3875a:94a-18: / rin chen sems de rgyas par bya ba'i phyir //
T04D3875a:94a-19: zhes brjod pa ni rigs te /
T04D3875a:94a-20: de bas na de dag ni sgra tsam yang mi shes par slob dpon la sdang bar zad do //
T04D3875a:94a-21: mdo sde du ma las kyang dang po yon phul
T04D3875a:94a-22: nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed pa mang
T04D3875a:94a-23: du byung la / slob dpon rnams kyang dang po
T04D3875a:94a-24: mchod pa la sogs pas sems rnam par sbyangs nas
T04D3875a:94a-25: gdod sems bskyed do zhes mthun par 'chad do //
T04D3875a:94a-26: skabs ma yin par smras so zhes brgal ba'i lan ni kho bos thog ma kho nar smras so //
T04D3875a:94a-27: de ltar na 'dis smon pa byang chub kyi sems
T04D3875a:94a-28: bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di la slob dpon zhi ba'i
T04D3875a:94a-29: 'tsho la sogs pas lugs tha dad pa gang gis
T04D3875a:94a-30: mdun du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa bshad pa
T04D3875a:94a-31: de dag gis kyang 'dir brtsad du med de /
T04D3875a:94a-32: lung dag las sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i gang zag
T04D3875a:94a-33: las byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi snang ba'i
T04D3875a:94a-34: phyir dang / lugs 'di la nyes pa ci yang med pa'i phyir dang /
T04D3875a:94a-35: slob dpon ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi lung yod cing
T04D3875a:94a-36: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i phyir ro
T04D3875a:94a-37: // yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T04D3875a:94a-38: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga slob dpon
T04D3875a:94b-0: zhi ba'i lha dang mthun par mdzad @94b pa'i phyir
T04D3875a:94b-1: dang / lugs gzhan pas 'di nyid tshad ma dang
T04D3875a:94b-2: ldan par snang ba'i phyir de ltar smon pa'i byang
T04D3875a:94b-3: chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
T04D3875a:94b-4: 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sbyor bas de brjod par
T04D3875a:94b-5: dang / bya ste / 'di yang gnas brtan ma
T04D3875a:94b-6: che ba'i sde la sogs pa'i gzhung bden pa mthong
T04D3875a:94b-7: ba'i dbang las 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems su
T04D3875a:94b-8: dang / bya ste / brjod cing / 'jig rten pa'i lam thams cad smon par 'jog pa dang /
T04D3875a:94b-9: kha cig gis bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba
T04D3875a:94b-10: dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ni 'jug pa byang
T04D3875a:94b-11: chub kyi sems zhes brjod la /
T04D3875a:94b-12: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang mi ldan
T04D3875a:94b-13: pa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad smon pa can no
T04D3875a:94b-14: zhes brjod pa de dag drang ba ma yin te
T04D3875a:94b-15: / 'dir ni de ltar sems sbyangs pa'i gang zag byang chub tu smon lam btab cing /
T04D3875a:94b-16: bslab pa la gnas pa de'i bslab pa mi 'jig
T04D3875a:94b-17: par rjes su bsrung ba pa rol tu phyin pa
T04D3875a:94b-18: drug la spyod pa de nyid sems bskyed pa 'phel
T04D3875a:94b-19: ba dang / 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems so
T04D3875a:94b-20: zhes blo'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag 'chad de
T04D3875a:94b-21: ba dang / / de'i phyir de ltar sems bskyed nas /
T04D3875a:94b-22: rgyal ba'i sras kyis de lta bur zhes pa nas /
T04D3875a:94b-23: stong pa nyid gcig ston par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyi le'u drug gis /
T04D3875a:94b-28: shes rab dag la spyad cing /
T04D3875a:94b-29: de bzhin du smon lam gyi le'u las bshad pa'i
T04D3875a:94b-30: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par btab pas sbyin pa'i
T04D3875a:94b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste
T04D3875a:94b-32: ; 'di ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems te /
T04D3875a:94b-33: sems snga ma 'phel bar byed pa'o //
T04D3875a:94b-34: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T04D3875a:94b-35: pa bstan pa'i le'u ni don dam pa byang chub
T04D3875a:94b-36: kyi sems su brjod pa yin la /
T04D3875a:94b-37: le'u gzhan dgus ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems su brjod pa nyid do //
T04D3875a:94b-38: de ltar na byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi ngo bor yang 'di gnas so //
T04D3875a:94b-39: byang chub rnams kyi ngo bo pha rol tu phyin
T04D3875a:94b-40: pa drug la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems de
T04D3875a:94b-41: ni nges par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
T04D3875a:94b-42: 'gyur te / nus pa mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyu tshogs pa na /
T04D3875a:95a-1: pa'i 'bras bu grub pa ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las grub po //
T04D3875a:95a-2: de'i phyir 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni shugs kyis bstan te /
T04D3875a:95a-3: des na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
T04D3875a:95a-4: pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras thams cad kyi lam
T04D3875a:95a-5: 'bras bu dang bcas pa brjod pa ;
T04D3875a:95a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'i byang
T04D3875a:95a-7: chub sems dpa'i sde snod thams cad kyi ma lta
T04D3875a:95a-9: 'dir 'ga' zhig byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i grangs
T04D3875a:95a-10: su chud pa du zhig yin zhes rtogs pa'i ched
T04D3875a:95a-12: slob dpon tsandra go mis grangs nyung shos nges par mdzad pa dang /
T04D3875a:95a-13: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba las /
T04D3875a:95a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya zhes
T04D3875a:95a-15: grangs su chud pa la sogs pa ni ma nges
T04D3875a:95a-16: te / de dag ni che long tsam la dgongs pa dang /
T04D3875a:95a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni bsam gyis mi
T04D3875a:95a-18: khyab pa yin par lung du ma las mthong ba'i
T04D3875a:95a-19: phyir ro // de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i
T04D3875a:95a-20: bslab pa ni mdor bsdu na gnyis kho na ste
T04D3875a:95a-21: phyir ro // / gang gis sems can la phan pa thams cad bya ba dang /
T04D3875a:95a-22: gang gis sems can thams cad la gnod pa thams cad spang pa'o //
T04D3875a:95a-23: gzhi de gnyis las ma 'das mod kyi /
T04D3875a:95a-24: rgyal bar byed pa'i tshad nges par yang bden pa
T04D3875a:95a-25: mthong ba dag gis kyang bya bar mi nus so
T04D3875a:95a-26: // de bzhin du gnang ba dang bkag pa yang
T04D3875a:95a-27: snying rje dang shes rab la ltos pas ma nges
T04D3875a:95a-28: // te / nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa'i mtsho chen ltar //
T04D3875a:95a-29: mnyam pa'i snying rje chen po khrid byed cing //
T04D3875a:95a-30: nang na kha ba ltar bsil phyi rol na //
T04D3875a:95a-31: rtsub pa nyid kyis 'gro ba skyong bar byed //
T04D3875a:95a-32: ces gsungs pa la sogs pas thabs dang shes rab
T04D3875a:95a-33: chen po dag la ni bag yangs su spyod pa
T04D3875a:95a-34: yang yin la / ltung bas kyang mi reg go //
T04D3875a:95a-35: shes rab dang snying rje chung ba dag ni bcings pas gnas pa yang yin la /
T04D3875a:95a-36: yang dang yang du yang ltung bas kyang 'dzin te /
T04D3875a:95a-37: de'i phyir rjes su gnang ba dang /
T04D3875a:95a-38: bkag pa yang ma nges so //
T04D3875a:95a-39: ltung ba 'byung ba yang ma nges te /
T04D3875a:95a-40: dman pa kha cig ni dngos por 'dzin pa'i dbang
T04D3875a:95a-41: gis 'gyod cing yid la gcags pas gzhan gyi drung
T04D3875a:95b-1: phyis sdom pa'i rigs kyis nyes ba de las ring zhig na ldang ba yang yod do //
T04D3875a:95b-2: bar ma kha cig ni rig sngags kyi lha byang
T04D3875a:95b-3: chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa
T04D3875a:95b-5: lha'i rjes su gnang ba thob pas ltung ba las ldang ngo //
T04D3875a:95b-6: dam pa kha cig ni gang gis ltung ba brjod
T04D3875a:95b-7: pa de nyid la byang chub kyi sems su shes
T04D3875a:95b-8: pas tshogs med par gnas te /
T04D3875a:95b-9: ji ltar 'phags pa'i chos thams cad 'byung ba med
T04D3875a:95b-10: par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
T04D3875a:95b-12: 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis las med
T04D3875a:95b-13: cing rnam smin med pa de las kyi sgrib pa
T04D3875a:95b-14: rnam par dag pa thob po zhes bya ba la
T04D3875a:95b-17: lus gsum pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
T04D3875a:95b-18: 'jig rten gyi legs pa thams cad bla ma dang 'dod pa'i lha las 'byung bas na /
T04D3875a:95b-19: 'di gnyis ni bdag la bka' drin rjes su gnang ba yin no zhes pa dang /
T04D3875a:95b-20: sems can dag byas pa gzo ba dang mi 'bral
T04D3875a:95b-21: bar gyur cig ces dgongs pas yul rnam pa gnyis
T04D3875a:95b-22: la phyag btsal ba'i drin du gzo ba'i tshig brjod
T04D3875a:95b-24: gzhung gi tshogs ni bdag gis ma phye ste /
T04D3875a:95b-26: slob dpon dag gis 'grel pa dang /
T04D3875a:95b-27: t'i ka la sogs pa las gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3875a:95b-28: bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa'i rtogs dka' ba yi gnas rnams ni //
T04D3875a:95b-29: bdag gis bla ma'i rjes 'brangs rab tu gsal byas pas //
T04D3875a:95b-30: 'gro rnams dad pas byang chub sems gnyis bzhon par rab zhugs nas //
T04D3875a:95b-31: sdug bsngal ma lus mthar phyin 'jam dbyangs spyod yul
T04D3875a:95b-32: nyid gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
T04D3875a:95b-33: la 'jug pa'i rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas gtan la
T04D3875a:95b-34: phab pa'i gzhung slob dpon mkhas pa chen po krishna
T04D3875a:95b-35: pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3875a:95b-37: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pa de nyid dang /
